H0.text: The Statue of Liberty, officially presented to the United States on July 4, 1884, holds a torch and a tablet. In what hand is the torch held. Left

H1.text: The Statue of Liberty, officially presented to the United States on July 4, 1884, holds a torch and a tablet. In what hand is the torch held. Both

H2.text: The Statue of Liberty, officially presented to the United States on July 4, 1884, holds a torch and a tablet. In what hand is the torch held. Neither

H3.text: The Statue of Liberty, officially presented to the United States on July 4, 1884, holds a torch and a tablet. In what hand is the torch held. Right

A4.text: she holds a torch above her head with her right hand

A5.text: in her left hand carries a tabula ansata inscribed JULY IV MDCCLXXVI
